channel.title: Redrock Lens Ffmpeg Batch Video on Personal Portfolio of Nate Rudolph
channel.description: Recent content in Redrock Lens Ffmpeg Batch Video on Personal Portfolio of Nate Rudolph

item.title: Batch rotation for video files
item.description: <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Data.Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> I recently had a collection of videos I wanted to start editing that needed to be rotated by 180 degrees because they were originally shot on a Redrock lens that flips the image upside down. The files were all uncompressed movs so I wanted a way to also convert everything to mp4 in one step.
